resources.string:
Voici la liste des plugins OctoPrint actuellement supportés par Printoid.

Tous les plugins OctoPrint ne sont pas implémentés dans l'appli et je ne peux pas tous les intégrer.

Contactez moi sur printoid.for.octoprint@gmail.com si vous souhaitez voir un nouveau plugin dans Printoid. Je réflechierais à son intégration (si et seulement si cela est possible).
This OctoPrint plugin controls an ATX/AUX power supply to help reduce power consumption and noise when the printer is not in use.
Work inspired by OctoPrint-PSUControl and TP-Link WiFi SmartPlug Client, this plugin controls a TP-Link Smartplug via OctoPrint\'s nav bar.
Control pretty much everything that you might want to do on your Raspberry Pi/OctoPrint/Enclosure.
Display temperatures on OctoPrint\'s navigation bar. For Raspberry Pi users, this plugin allows to show the Raspberry Pi\'s CPU temperature in the app title bar automatically.
The PSU Control plugin should be installed on your OctoPrint server.\n\nThen it will automatically appear in the left menu of the app.

The TP-Link SmartPlug plugin should be installed on your OctoPrint server.

Then it will automatically appear in the left menu of the app.

Adjust its behavior from the settings of Printoid.
This plugin will be integrated very soon in Printoid!
The Navbar Temp plugin should be installed on your OctoPrint server.\n\nThen if you are using a Raspberry Pi, its CPU temperature will appear automatically in the app\'s title bar.
